entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 40%
